name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Full Stack Engineer with 10+ years of experience delivering high-performance software solutions with a strong focus on **.NET**, **C#**, **SQL Server**, and **Angular**. Expert in developing scalable web applications using **MVC**, **Entity Framework**, and **Web-API**, complemented by a solid understanding of **REST-API** design and **XML** integration. Proficient in leveraging modern practices in **CI/CD** with tools like **Jenkins** and **AzureDevOps**, alongside agile methodologies to streamline development processes and enhance team productivity. Experienced in writing robust unit tests using **NUnit**, **Moq**, and **Jest** to ensure code quality and maintainability.

Possesses a strong technical background in JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, and Flutter, with hands-on expertise in frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Demonstrates a knack for building and deploying cloud-native applications on **Azure** and **AWS**, while also leading the development of enterprise platforms that integrate AI/ML capabilities for real-time analytics and automation. Skilled in microservices architecture and event-driven systems, with a commitment to developing secure, compliant solutions that meet standards including HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Passionate about driving real-world impact through technology.

experience.responsibilities:
•	Developed and maintained scalable, full-stack applications using **.NET**, **C#**, and **SQL Server**, focusing on enhancing application performance and security across multiple healthcare and finance projects.
•	Created dynamic single-page applications with **Angular**, ensuring seamless interactions through proficient use of **REST-API** services and **Web-API** architecture.
•	Implemented **Entity Framework** for data access, optimizing database operations through efficient **TSQL** queries, and established a robust data layer with a focus on scalability and maintainability.
•	Engineered high-quality back-end services, incorporating **MVC** design principles and leveraging testing frameworks such as **NUnit** and **Moq** to ensure code reliability and performance under high-load conditions.
•	Designed and executed **CI/CD** pipelines using **Jenkins** and **Azure DevOps**, streamlining deployment processes for improved release cycles and reducing deployment errors by **30%**.
•	Collaborated in Agile teams to drive project deliverables, contributing to sprint planning and retrospective meetings to refine workflows and enhance team productivity by **25%**.
•	Integrated advanced queuing mechanisms to enhance message processing using **Queue Management**, leading to a **50%** reduction in response times for critical transactions.
•	Conducted thorough code reviews and established coding standards, achieving a code coverage of over **85%** through rigorous testing strategies across diverse project components.
•	Facilitated knowledge-sharing workshops on best practices in full-stack development and tools such as **Git** for version control, improving team skill sets and collaboration.
•	Led the migration of legacy systems to modern architectures, resulting in a **40%** decrease in maintenance costs and increased system resilience through structured and efficient solutions.

Utilized **.NET** and **C#** to lead the development and modernization of financial platforms, focusing on scalability and maintainability in high-volume transaction systems.
Employed **SQL Server** for data management and efficient querying, ensuring data integrity and performance across applications.
Designed and implemented robust **REST-API** services using **ASP.NET MVC** and **Web API**, promoting seamless integration with front-end frameworks, enhancing user experience in financial services.
Developed dynamic, user-centric front-end applications using **Angular** and **TypeScript**, leveraging **Entity Framework** to interact with back-end services and ensure responsiveness.
Incorporated **CI/CD** practices through **Jenkins** and **AzureDevOps**, achieving a deployment frequency increase of **30%** and reducing lead time for changes by **40%**.
Executed unit testing using **NUnit** and **Moq**, achieving code coverage of **85%**, ensuring high-quality and bug-free software delivery.
Participated in Agile methodologies to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams, improving project turnaround times and team productivity by **25%**.
Implemented robust queue management through services like **RabbitMQ** and enhanced system reliability, facilitating asynchronous processing of financial transactions.
Established a strong version control system using **Git**, fostering collaboration and versioning across multiple environments.
Streamlined communication protocols with XML for data exchange between integrated systems, ensuring standardized data formatting.

Utilized **.NET**, **C#**, and **SQL Server** to design and develop robust web-API services, enhancing application performance and integrating seamlessly into the e-commerce architecture.
Designed and implemented scalable front-end solutions with **Angular** and **TypeScript**, ensuring the delivery of a fast and responsible user experience across multiple devices.
Developed automated testing protocols using **NUnit** and **Moq**, achieving over **90%** code coverage and significantly improving code quality across significant product releases.
Employed **Jenkins** for CI/CD pipelines, facilitating continuous integration and deployment that reduced release times by **30%**.
Managed and optimized relational database queries in **TSQL**, enhancing data retrieval efficiency and maintaining system integrity across high-traffic environments.
Participated in Agile methodologies, effectively collaborating with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and deliver features within **2-week** sprint cycles.
Implemented queue management strategies, incorporating asynchronous processing for improved responsiveness and user experience during peak transaction periods.
Designed and maintained REST-API endpoints for secure and efficient data exchange, ensuring reliability and performance in all service interactions.
Contributed to version control management using **Git**, ensuring efficient collaboration and tracking of the development process.
Optimized workflows using **AzureDevOps** for project management and collaboration, leading to streamlined operations and tracking of project timelines and deliverables.
